snippet: A rolling river with an electric socket sticking out of it is one of many images that underscore the tension between artifice and nature in the photographer Mark Lyon's series, "Landscapes for the People."
abstract: A rolling river with an electric socket sticking out of it is one of many images that underscore the tension between artifice and nature in the photographer Mark Lyon's series, "Landscapes for the People."

headline.main: Staring at the Wall, Encountering Nature
